thread.title: Joanna Kolakowska
thread.title_full: Trustpilot UK reviewed by Joanna Kolakowska

author: Joanna Kolakowska
title: Joanna Kolakowska
text: I complained about Tour Center two months ago. They replied that they dealing with it and I never heard anything ever since. I never received an email asking if any action has been taken. Knowing how the Tour Center treaded me and reading other websites reviews, the ones you published are not right.
